title: Notifications for text contacts. Used to have simple on/off toggle now it doesn't. Get it back?
content:
It's not a problem, it's a feature I'd like to get back.
In messaging, one person, you used to be able to go into the menu (three dots top right) then details, notifications and simply turn them off or on. Then beyond that have more granular options like 'display silently' 'notification dot' etc.
Can we please have this back?
